name: Ford Mobility Motoring Program
description: Up to $1,000 rebate for adaptive vehicle equipment on new Ford vehicles
fullDescription: Ford offers up to $1,000 reimbursement toward the cost of adaptive equipment or $200 for alert hearing devices, lumbar support, or running boards when purchasing or leasing a new Ford vehicle.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $1,000 reimbursement for adaptive equipment
- $200 rebate for alert hearing devices
- $200 rebate for lumbar support
- $200 rebate for running boards
- Available on new Ford vehicle purchase or lease
- Applies to eligible equipment installations
howToGetIt:
1. Purchase or lease new Ford vehicle
2. Have eligible adaptive equipment installed
3. Submit reimbursement request with receipts
4. Mail to Ford Mobility Motoring Program
5. Receive reimbursement check
6. Must submit within 12 months of purchase
keywords: Ford, mobility, rebate, adaptive equipment, disability, vehicle modification, wheelchair accessible
